Features.StoriesManager.description-$1-g: Fonio is a tool aimed at building rich html pages featuring text, bibliographic references, images, interactive resources such as visualizations and videos.
Features.StoriesManager.description-$2-f: Write your story and enrich it with diverse resources, then customize its look, then export it as a plain HTML file to host anywhere on the web.
Features.StoriesManager.about-forccast: Fonio is made in the frame of the FORCCAST project, a series of pedagogical experiments about the cartography of controversies, a new approach to socio-technical issues through simulation and web analysis.
Features.StoriesManager.about-medialab: Fonio was built at mÃ©dialab, a research center aiming at connecting social sciences to new digital tools and methods.
